name: Missing (PaulC)
description:
Hey~!

This is my submission for the Community Game Jam 2019, and my first game jam submission (ever). First time I've done something this complex on my own, and hopefully you enjoy it!

Controls:

  • WASD movement
  • ENTER interact
  • Hover over characters for more info
  • Click the text box to advance

Most of the source will also be located on my github here:

https://github.com/pfcaygill/Community_Game_Jam_2019

I also have a twitter, which I use very rarely but am hoping to focus on my development based activities
